title: Tira
overview: After rescuing nine kids from a human sacrifice ritual, Suci is struck with a curse â€” she'll die within 40 days. The mysterious Ben helps her to find a cure through an ancient power. Suci needs to balance her budding career as a movie stuntwoman, maintaining her grades and scholarship on campus, while saving her own life. She's getting dragged into a complicated situation when she finds out that the ancient powers belong to highly-acclaimed people who are caught in a secret war.
